column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////But oh--here comes the saving grace. Yes
column2: we decided to forego our size 26 appetites and went for desert. The flan--coconut
column3: to be specific. I literally had a bodily reaction that I have never experienced before in my life. So we ordered another. If I could marry a desert
column4: I think this would be the "One". Really--it was that incredible.
